long_description: The Urbanears Medis earbuds take the cake when it comes to remaining firmly in place. With an almost nonexistent level of pressure, these earbuds offer supreme comfort. Dynamic sounds and sleek, minimalist design are sure to make these earbuds an instant favorite. Patented EarClick design positions the earbuds securely and comfortably in your ear by leveraging the bottom of the ear; 4 sizes of silicone pads offer a perfect fit. Earbuds rest a short distance from your ear canal, helping you maintain your sense of balance. The Urbanears Medis earbuds feature a tangle-resistant cord with a 3.5mm stereo plug.
short_description: The Urbanears Medis earbuds take the cake when it comes to remaining firmly in place. With an almost nonexistent level of pressure, these earbuds offer supreme comfort.
